name: SuuntoDMEditor
description: Application to edit the Suunto Dive Manager database (electron version)

scripts.rebuild-sqlite3: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && npm run prepublish && node-gyp configure --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v45-darwin-x64 && node-gyp rebuild --target=0.27.1 --arch=x64 --target_platform=darwin --dist-url=https://atom.io/download/atom-shell --module_name=node_sqlite3 --module_path=../lib/binding/node-v45-darwin-x64
